substats: Crit Rate >= Crit DMG > ATK% > Speed

conesNew.notes: Best in slot for Seele. Assumes 6 stacks.

Specialized 40% Crit Rate build. Seele's high hit count on Skill can reliably proc the effect, and her Resurgence can manipulate the buffed turn to last much longer. Requires good rotation and turn manipulation.
Assumes 6 stacks and to achieve that, Seele with less than 2 Eidolon requires 8 speed rolls on Relics.
Assumes 5 stacks and to achieve that, Seele with less than 2 Eidolon requires 3 speed rolls on Relics.
Full ATK% Uptime, 50% Crit Rate Uptime. Helps with Seele's playstyle of scoring kills and resetting.
Great Crit buffs with some downtime.
Seele Builds 4 Stacks per hit. DMG Drops by 17-26% when switching targets.
Assumes the second part of the Cone is active - so you fight 2 enemies or less.
No ATK% Uptime, 50% Uptime on additional Crit Rate (24% Total Crit Rate).
The value of the cone can be higher but depends on SPD Breakpoints and requires Seele to not get hit.
Seele Builds 4 Stacks per hit. DMG Drops by 9-14% when switching targets.
